description: This file defines a 'Button' component using the LightningJS framework, with a template that displays text depending on its state and handles an 'enter' input to toggle the favorite state.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component's state, including 'isFavorited', 'favoriteText', and 'unfavoriteText'.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the 'enter' input event to toggle the 'isFavorited' state.
